sources.title: Meta's AI translation remakes Reels in your language
sources.snippet:
Meta has introduced a new AI-powered feature that automatically translates, dubs, and lip-syncs Reels on Facebook and Instagram into different languages, currently supporting English, Spanish, Hindi, and Portuguese. This enhancement allows users to experience videos as if they were originally created in their native language, complete with voice cloning that mimics the original speaker’s tone and cadence, and optional lip-syncing for added realism. While this service isn't available for all users, Facebook creators with over 1,000 followers and all public Instagram accounts in supported countries can access the feature for free.

Clearly labeled with a "Translated with Meta AI" tag, viewers have the option to disable translations or keep the original audio. This move builds on Meta’s history of multilingual content tools like auto-captions and subtitled Stories. However, it marks the company’s first use of AI for voice cloning and lip-syncing, giving Meta a potential advantage over competitors like YouTube and TikTok, who offer translation overlays and captions but not real-time dubbing with voice sync. The innovation aims to make short-form content more globally accessible and culturally inclusive.

citation_mappings.claim_text: (These often require sign-up and may have time limits.) 3) Platform-specific free options Meta AI for Reels – auto-translates and dubs Instagram/Facebook Reels into supported languages for free if eligible. TechRadar

sources.title: 7 Best AI Video Translators in 2025
sources.snippet: 7 Best AI Video Translators in 2025 By Alex • Updated Mar 12, 2025 AI Video Translators allow you to effortlessly translate videos to a different language, truly opening up possibilities to reach a wider audience. After comprehensive testing of 21 options, we are excited to present the top 7 AI Video Translators.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Skeptical take: The free translations usually rely on automatic subtitle generation and machine translation. Accuracy varies with audio quality, accents, and language pair; output often needs manual correction for professional use. Paid tiers usually offer better voice quality, longer videos, and true voice-cloned dubbing. Useful AI
